The American Theatre Wing’s 74th Annual Tony Awards® will be broadcast on four continents. The telecast will air on the following networks across the globe:

INTERNATIONAL BROADCASTS

Unless otherwise noted, the broadcasts will occur either live or within a week of the September 26 U.S. broadcast on Paramount+/CBS. Check local listings in advance to confirm air dates and times. All information is subject to change.

The Tony Awards are presented by The Broadway League and the American Theatre Wing.

OTHER LIVE COVERAGE

Even if your country or region isn’t listed, Tonys fans may watch live coverage of Tony Awards events here at TonyAwards.com and on social media. Long before the curtain goes up on the big night, viewers can follow the @TheTonyAwards on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

The 74th Annual Tony Awards

Sunday, September 26, 2021

Hosted by Audra McDonald

Live at 7pmET/4pmPT on Paramount+



Followed by “The Tony Awards Present: Broadway’s Back!”

Hosted by Leslie Odom, Jr.

9/8c on CBS

The Tony Awards, which honors theatre professionals for distinguished achievement on Broadway, has been broadcast on CBS since 1978. The Tony Awards are presented by The Broadway League and the American Theatre Wing.
